Hi {!Case.Name__c},
We refer to case {!Case.CaseNumber}.
Thank you for your enquiry. Please note that any claims relating to lost and/or damaged delayed articles must first be lodged through our Customer Contact Centre (CCC) on 13 11 18 or via the Business Support Portal.
Our service team will investigate what has occurred and will process any compensation payable in line with the terms and conditions of the service used. If you have already lodged a case through the above, please use that case number as a reference when making a contact.
Kind regards,
Customer Resolutions Team Australia Post credit.claims@auspost.com.au {!Case.EmailThreadID__c}
